In England, in the seven days to 16 October, there were 257,677 new confirmed cases (455.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 09 October, there were 213,056 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 21% (44,621 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 21 October is 7,347,703 (12,993.3 cases per 100,000 population).
